images.copyright: Daiichi Tadami River Bridge, Fukushima prefecture, Japan (© DoctorEgg/Getty Images)
images.title: All aboard the ice train
images.caption: Daiichi Tadami River Bridge, Fukushima, Japan
images.desc: The Tadami Line is one of the most scenic railway lines in Japan. It winds through beautiful landscapes over 84 miles from Aizu-Wakamatsu, Fukushima prefecture, to Uonuma, Niigata prefecture. As travelers cross the Daiichi Tadami River Bridge, pictured in today's image, they are treated to gorgeous vistas of the river below and the forests that blanket the area. After a snowfall, the icy blue water of the Tadami River cuts a bold streak through the forest, providing a welcome splash of color in a blanket of white.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
